properties.value: The Black square shield (abbreviated in-game as black sq shield) is a square shield made of black metal requiring 10 Defence to equip. Its defensive bonuses are slightly better than those of a steel kiteshield, but slightly inferior to those of a black kiteshield. Like all other black armour, it cannot be made with the Smithing skill.

Item ID1179

The Black square shield (abbreviated in-game as black sq shield) is a square shield made of black metal requiring 10 Defence to equip. Its defensive bonuses are slightly better than those of a steel kiteshield, but slightly inferior to those of a black kiteshield. Like all other black armour, it cannot be made with the Smithing skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6+0
 Defence bonuses
+15+16+14+0+15
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List
